product_name: The North Face Triple C Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: On the coldest days of the year, wrap up in the quilted warmth of The North Face Triple C women's down jacket, literally. The 47 in. length covers you from head to calves in 700-fill-power down. Premium 700-fill-power goose down is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Silky nylon taffeta exterior features a Durable Water Repellent finish for added weather protection. Lining is 100% recycled polyester taffeta that slides on easily over sweaters. Ajustable hood is removable. Exposed 2-way center-front zipper has kissing welts and an internal draft flap to keep out the cold. Internal media pocket with cord guide; zippered hand pockets. The North Face Triple C down jacket for women features variegated quilting throughout the body.
short_description: On the coldest days of the year, wrap up in the quilted warmth of The North Face Triple C women's down jacket, literally. The 47 in. length covers you from head to calves in 700-fill-power down.
